content: solstice star is a 7 part crochet along which begins friday 3rd october 2025 this is a free pattern but you will need to be a free member on crystalsandcrochet com to access the pattern there are full photo tutorials and also step by step video tutorials in us terms each part will be published on a friday morning at approx 10am uk time you will be able to find the pattern and links to videos each week on my website and also in my facebook group helen s hookaholics 1 i often see people who are new to my designs say that they do not think they will be able to do it although many beginners have made my designs and learned a lot along the way we will be making a full sized square blanket how much yarn will you need there will be 3 yarn packs available from woolwarehouse links can be found on my website the total amount of yarn needed is normal double knit yarn #3 weight 8-ply approx 4750 metres 5155 yards 4mm g hook finished size 155cm / 61 inches aran worsted #4 weight 10-ply approx 20% more yarn how much yarn you need depends on how many colours you chose to use please see the details of the yarn packs in the introducing solstice star 2 post on my website to give you an idea 1 https //www facebook com/groups/helenshookaholics 2 https //crystalsandcrochet com/product/introducing-solstice-star
